name: typebuilder
short_description:
Almost all java projects have a need to create test data for unit testing and in order to have ready data you can use to test you have to have a dataset already created or exported from somewhere(persistent store/XML) and in some form(document/SQL) which is usually good enough. For the odd case where you have to create test data and instantiate java objects from the source code that is being tested you may have to have some test data populated using arbitrary values or perhaps sensible values into your objects. When the number of these objects increases and if the number of fields in them increases then creating test data is usually a task in itself. 
The aim of this project is to provide an API that can be reused and produce such data within your defined constraints.
summary: Object producer to create data for testing
